mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION(RESERV_NO, USER_ID, STORE_ID, Menu_name, RESERV_CONFIRM) values(SEQ_RESERV_NO.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{store_id}, #{menu_name}, #{reserv_confirm})
mapper.select:
SELECT s.Store_name, r.store_id, u.user_name, r.reserv_confirm, r.menu_name
FROM reservation r INNER JOIN tb_store s ON r.Store_id = s.Store_id inner join tb_user u on r.user_id = u.user_id
